extension.name: plg_content_jomres_asamodule_mambot
extension.author: Vince Wooll
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 Vince Wooll All rights reserved.
extension.description: Jomres ASAmodule content mambot. Show Jomres pages in your Joomla content. Whatever you can do in Jomres ASAModule, you can replicate the output in this mambot. Create the tag like {asamambot task "arguments"} so for example {asamambot remoteavailability "&id=1"}
